name: Temple Knight
description:
Keyboard + Mouse only!

  • W/A/S/D : Move
  • L-SHIFT : Run
  • Left Mouse : Shoot
  • Left ALT : Menu 
  • ESC/F11 : Exit Full Screen.

You are a knight. Defend the temple from raiders! 

Kill the raiding automatons with your cannon to score points. You have infinite health as long as you don't fall out of the temple area!

A simple game I've built while learning Bevy Game Engine. Uses Bevy 0.8.
